subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Iman Shumpert’s one-handed slam dunk in Game 2 against the Pacers showed how far he has come since he tore his anterior cruciate ligament in the first playoff game of last season.
snippet: Iman Shumpert’s one-handed slam dunk in Game 2 against the Pacers showed how far he has come since he tore his anterior cruciate ligament in the first playoff game of last season.
